It was hard to tell what was going on throughout the entire film, but it was pretty obvious that they weren't really up to the task.<citation needed]Overall, I highly recommend this movie to anyone who appreciates Robert DeNiro's talent and/or insight into the world of acting and directing. This is a must-see for anyone interested in the arts and film making. Highly recommended. 3 out of 10.

... and I can't believe this is one of the best movies ever made. It has everything you could ask for in a film! The acting is good, the special effects are amazing, and the photography is top notch! I highly recommend this movie to anyone who likes to see what it's like to be a child in the 60's. If you haven't seen it yet, don't miss it! 10/10.

Overall this is a must-see for fans of both the original series and the new season. This is definitely one to look forward to! <4 out (out of 5). 9/10.

... I do not believe the film was made in the late 70s or early 80s. There were so many different people involved with this film that it is hard to keep track of. It is a very original and well made film. The story is very well told and the acting is quite good. If you haven't seen it yet, I highly recommend it. A must see for any fan of sci-fi and fantasy. 8 out of 10.
